= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Nose sensory data (nose-sensory-data)*
   * *Nose - olfactory mucosa (nose-olfactory-mucosa -> BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_OLB)*: Sensing smells
   * *Nose - proprioceptors (nose-proprioceptors -> BrainRegionHMA_MM_MSTR)*: proprioception
   * *Nose - touch receptors (nose-somatic -> BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_TRG)*: touch
   * *Nose - visceral nodose receptors (nose-visceral-vagus -> BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_NOD)*: visceral sensations
   * *Nose - visceral pharynx receptors (nose-visceral-pharynx -> BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_PET)*: visceral sensations
  * *Ear sensory control (nose-sensory-control)*
   * *Nose - nasal glands (BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_PTG -> nose-nasal-glands)*: smelling control and moisturing
  * *Nose nasalis, depressor septi, procerus, dilator naris, accessory labial muscles (nose-muscles)*: constricts nostrils, lower alar pars and helps to wrinkle nose
   * *Nose - depressor septi nasi muscle (BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM -> nose-depressor-septi-nasi)*: depression of nasal septum
   * *Nose - levator labii superioris alaeque nasi muscle (BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM -> nose-levator-labii-superioris-alaeque-nasi)*: dilates the nostril; elevates the upper lip and wing of the nose
   * *Nose - nasalis muscle (BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM -> nose-nasalis)*: compresses bridge, depresses tip of nose, elevates corners of nostrils
   * *Nose - salpingopharyngeus muscle (BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB -> nose-salpingopharyngeus)*: raise the nasopharynx
